attributes.action: Make Satellite Navigation sytems 100% tax deductible to Business Users to help reduce CO2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Satallite navigation systems should be used as widely as possible by commercial vehicles, by allowing a 100% tax deduction. Such use would greatly reduce the amount of miles driven by commercial vehicles and the congestion / pollution they cause, particularly whilst searching for addresses / access routes in city centres.
